EmailTemplate.description: Partner Info - Email to notify the rejection of Addendum renewal
EmailTemplate.name: PartnerInfo Renew Addendum Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: Renew Negotiated Payment for {!Partner_Addendum__c.Licence__c} is Rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Request to renew the negotiated payment - {!Partner_Addendum__c.Sub_Type__c} for Licence {!Partner_Addendum__c.Licence__c} is rejected.
Reason for rejection:
{!ApprovalRequest.Comments}
Regards,
